replies.body:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Open a support ticket with Riot support.
You aren't going to be "unperma banned". Thats the real answer.

**Permanent
**
[pur-muh-nuh nt] 

adjective

1) existing perpetually; everlasting, especially without significant change.

2) intended to exist or function for a long, indefinite period without regard to unforeseeable conditions:
a permanent employee; the permanent headquarters of the United Nations.

3) long-lasting or nonfading:
permanent pleating; permanent ink.

If your account was shield banned or a ban error... you can open a support ticket.

If your permaban was due to your behavior.... you will most likely not get it back even with a support ticket.
Do you not know the definition of 'permanent'?
